name: Space Station Building Sim
description:
The fate of spaceport lays in your hands! Complete various missions sitting behind the steering wheel of heavy construction vehicles, build the hangar and launching pad for the spaceport and have fun Space Station Building Simulator!

Feel like a professional builder on duty! Build the hangar and look how rockets, shuttles, and other spaceships start its stellar journey!

Go through all the stages of the building! Dig the pit using an excavator, make the foundation with the concrete mixer, invest concrete blocks and asphalt cover with the tower crane, grab the garbage with the bulldozer and drive it away with your heavy truck!

Explore the construction site, complete all missions and unlock new vehicles or boosters for your game!
Have fun and feel like a savior of space industry with Space Station Building Simulator!

Space Station Building Simulator features:
• Unusual space city building simulator
• Interesting and colorful construction site
• Various types of interesting driving and construction missions
• Wonderfully colored graphics
